content: <article class="asked-question" style="display: block;"><h6>How do I care for my sheets?</h6><div class="asked-question-text"><p>The Lull Sheets are machine washable, so you can keep them fresh and free of allergens.&nbsp; We recommend you wash your sheets before first use.&nbsp; Machine wash cold, separately with mild detergent.&nbsp; Tumble dry, lowest heat setting.&nbsp; Warm iron as needed.</p></div></article><article class="asked-question" style="display: block;"><h6>What are the dimensions of the sheets?</h6><div class="asked-question-text"><table><tbody><tr><td><p>Size</p></td><td><p>Fitted Sheet</p></td><td><p>Flat Sheet</p></td><td><p>Pillowcase Pair</p></td></tr><tr><td><p><strong>Twin</strong></p></td><td><p>39” x 75” x 13”</p></td><td><p>71” x 98”</p></td><td><p>20” x 27”</p></td></tr><tr><td><p><strong>Twin XL</strong></p></td><td><p>39” x 80” x 13”</p></td><td><p>71” x 104”</p></td><td><p>20” x 27”</p></td></tr><tr><td><p><strong>Full</strong></p></td><td><p>54” x 75” x 13”</p></td><td><p>86” x 98”</p></td><td><p>20” x 27”</p></td></tr><tr><td><p><strong>Queen</strong></p></td><td><p>60” x 80” x 13”</p></td><td><p>92” x 104”</p></td><td><p>20” x 27”</p></td></tr><tr><td><p><strong>King</strong></p></td><td><p>78” x 80” x 13”</p></td><td><p>110” x 104”</p></td><td><p>20” x 37”</p></td></tr><tr><td><p><strong>Cal King</strong></p></td><td><p>72” x 84” x 13”</p></td><td><p>110” x 104”</p></td><td><p>20” x 37”</p></td></tr></tbody></table></div></article><article class="asked-question" style="display: block;"><h6>Where do the sheets ship from?</h6><div class="asked-question-text"><p>To best serve our customers, your sheets will ship from one of four U.S. locations in order to deliver your sheets in the shortest amount of time.</p></div></article><article class="asked-question" style="display: block;"><h6>How long until I receive the Lull Sheets?</h6><div class="asked-question-text"><p>The Lull Sheets will typically ship within 1-4 business days following your order.&nbsp; Once your Lull Sheets have shipped, we will provide you with information to track your order.</p></div></article><article class="asked-question" style="display: block;"><h6>What are the Lull Sheets made from?</h6><div class="asked-question-text"><p>The Lull Sheets are made from 100% long-staple Egyptian cotton.</p></div></article><article class="asked-question" style="display: block;"><h6>Where are the Lull Sheets made?</h6><div class="asked-question-text"><p>The Lull Sheets are made in Israel.</p></div></article><article class="asked-question" style="display: block;"><h6>If I don't like the Lull Sheets, will I get my money back?</h6><div class="asked-question-text"><p>Yes.&nbsp; If you find that during your trial period that The Lull Sheets are not to your liking, then we’ll fully refund it at no cost to you.</p></div></article><article class="asked-question" style="display: block;"><h6>How does the 100-Night Trial work for the Lull Sheets?</h6><div class="asked-question-text"><p>After you order your Lull Sheets, we’ll ship it right to your doorstep for free.&nbsp; Try it out in your home for 100 nights.&nbsp; If you don’t love it within the first 100 nights, we’ll arrange to have it sent back to us – then we’ll give you a full refund.&nbsp; For more information about our return policy, <a href="https://lull.com/trial">click here</a>.</p></div></article><article class="asked-question" style="display: block;"><h6>Do I have to use the original box to return the Lull Sheets?</h6><div class="asked-question-text"><p>No, you can use your original Lull box or any unmarked cardboard box to ship your return.</p></div></article><article class="asked-question" style="display: block;"><h6>How can I leave a review for the Lull Sheets?</h6><div class="asked-question-text"><p>Whether you’re happy or dissatisfied with our sheets we’d like to hear from you.&nbsp; Please leave a review on our website at lull.com/reviews or contact us directly to provide feedback.</p></div></article>
